Description.div: This indicates the available quantity. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).

Attribute.Name: EffectiveStartDate
Attribute.Description: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective from. Calculated based on the last RTAM execution time or the last EffectiveUntilDate.

Description.div: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective until.This is calculated based on earliest timestamp of the computed date of each node. The computed date of each node is computed based on the last cut-off time of the ship date and subtract back the minimum notification time based on the node's shipping calendar.
This flag indicates whether the AvailableQuantity is based on on-hand supply.
The date when this inventory is available.
